name: HealingSoundsbyHealingFM
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: healing sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Experience total relaxation with Healing Sounds by Healing FM, a top-rated Alexa Developer. Perfect to help you study, relax or sleep.

HOW TO START
Just say: "Alexa, open Healing Sounds"

SOUND LIBRARY
To play from the Healing Sounds library. Say "Alexa, open Healing Sounds and play…"
+ Forest
+ Thunderstorm
+ Rain
+ Meditation
+ Beach

LOOPING
To enable looping, open the Skill, and while the sound is playing, say: "Alexa... Loop On". This will repeat the 1 hour sound, after a small pause, until you ask Alexa to Stop, or you say "Alexa… Loop Off". The Pro version has 'Super Long Looping' which contains a gapless, uninterrupted 10 hour audio stream with no breaks.

TRY HEALING SOUNDS FOR
+ Good night's sleep
+ Peaceful environment
+ Improving your mood
+ Focus on study
+ Meditation

PRO MEMBER FEATURES
+ Superior Audio Quality
+ 10 Hr Gapless Super Long Looping.

REVIEWS & FEEDBACK
We’d love your feedback and would appreciate if you could leave us a review for this skill. If you have any questions or need support, please contact: team@healing.fm

ALL OUR SOUNDS
Search for these skills by Healing FM in the Skill Store:

Thunder Sounds
Beach Sounds 
Healing Sounds
Rain Storm
Zen Sounds
Lullaby Sounds
Japanese Garden Sounds
Relaxing Morning Sounds
Creek Sounds
Best Forest Sounds
Night Night
Fish Tank
Sleep Light

HEALING FM STUDIOS
From our studios next to the beautiful Pacific Ocean, we create and broadcast high quality relaxation experiences. Every month, more than 1 million people around the world use Healing FM sounds to find a moment of relaxation or prepare for a peaceful night's sleep. We hope you enjoy our sounds!
